28.3 , 19.2 , and 11 times lighter.from sentence: The results in 138 times lighter in model size and are 28.3 , 19.2 , and 11 times lighter in Madds .

margin.from sentence: The margin between PyramidBox and the proposed model on WIDER FACE hard case was 3.4 % .

m AP gap to DSFD.from sentence: The m AP gap to DSFD , which is tremendously heavier , is about 5.0 % , but it would be safe to suggest that the proposed method offers more decent trade - off in that DSFD uses about 2860 times more parameters than the proposed method .

our SSD - based variations.from sentence: When it comes to our SSD - based variations , they got lower mAP results than FPN - based variants .

compared to.from sentence: When compared to SOTA face detectors such as Pyra - midBox and DSFD , our best model EXTD - FPN - 64 - PReLU achieved lower results .

S3FD version.from sentence: However , when compared with the S3FD version trained with Mo - bile FaceNet backbone network , the proposed SSD variants achieved comparable or better detection performance .

our method.from sentence: From the table , we can see that our method achieved higher performance in WIDER FACE hard dataset than other cases .

different channel width.from sentence: First , for all the different channel width , FPN based architecture achieved better detection performance compared to SSD based architecture , especially for detecting small faces .

SSD based architecture.from sentence: When tested with SSD based architecture , PReLU outperformed Leaky - ReLU with larger margin than those using FPN structure .
